divs: Sighting Detailsmy husband and I were going to supper in the kingfield maine area, rural, i saw a bright white ball appear suddenly over the trees traveling very fast. it was large and did not seem too far away. almost as though it were trying to hide quickly and get out of sight,it curved toward the earth and went behind the trees..... years ago i SAW something that was alot like this ,only there were two of them and also at that time it seemed to have an intellience about its manuvers........I did not have to wonder what these objects were. i knew at first glance that they were not of our earth reality..i was not scared i wanted to go investigate but my husband is not as enthusiastic as i am about the unknown,,,,,
Summary: A bright white ball of light that appeared to curve toward the earth and drop.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kingfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
